requests.name: Washing Machine
requests.description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) has progressive Arthritis where he experiences pain, and wakes up from the discomfort in the middle of night. He has difficulty handwashing his clothes.
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a washing machine which could support the client in the washing of his clothes. 
 
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Gregory Ho at 8292 2210.   
 
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.  
  

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

requests.name: 2 Single-sized Sets of Mattress and Metal Bedframe
requests.description:
Mr Teo and Mr Koh (THK SGH @ Indus 79) 
Mr Teo and Mr Koh, who are living at THK Seniors Group Home @ Indus 79, recently had their apartment fumigated for bed bugs. After the assessment and treatment, the vendor suggested that the existing mattresses and bedframe sets of both clients should be disposed of.  
 
On behalf of the clients, THKMC is seeking for a donation of 2 sets of single-sized bedframe and mattress to replace the existing sets which will help prevent the spread of bed-bug infestation. 
 
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Mr Cheok at 8666 8635. The recipients are located at Indus Road Block 79 #09-475, Singapore 161079.  
 
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. 
 
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Seniors Group Homes (SGH). THK SGHs are assisted living homes that aim to enable seniors to co-reside independently in designated HDB rental flats which are retrofitted with elder-friendly features.
